OutgoingCallConvo1.CallerSentence: Hello Jane, this is Dany calling from ABC Corporation.This call is regarding the invoice number 8895463063 which is past due, when can we expect the payment for the invoice?
OutgoingCallConvo1.ReceiverSentence: Can you please mention the amount for the invoice?
OutgoingCallConvo1.ReceiverSentence1: I'll surely make the payment by end of next week
OutgoingCallConvo1.CallerSentence2: There are a couple of more invoices,which require payment, when can I expect the payment for them?
OutgoingCallConvo1.ReceiverSentence2: I raised a dispute for invoice number 4095202369.
OutgoingCallConvo1.CallerSentence3: okay, How about the other invoices
OutgoingCallConvo1.ReceiverSentence3: Could you please call me back next week ?
